name: Infiniworld
description:
Live through some of Greg's many lives in Infiniworld. Improve your title by traveling around the world while avoiding enemies along the way.

Controls:

Space to Jump

'a' or left arrow to slow down

'd' or right arrow to speed up

Escape to quit or go back to menu

` or 'm' to mute/unmute

This game was made as a solo project for the Iowa State University 2020 Spring Game Jam. The theme was "Tiny World".
